message: Hi! Congratulations, based on the data you presented to me, the risk of lung cancer in your case is low. However, you need to remember about prevention and regular examinations. Keep it up!

Hi. From the data you presented, I estimated that there is an average risk of developing lung cancer. It looks like it's a good time to go get tested and consult a specialist. Also remember to take preventive measures and improve your lifestyle. Your health is worth it, good luck!

Hi, I am sorry to say that from the data you provided, the risk of lung cancer is high.... You need to seek immediate medical attention, schedule thorough screenings, and consult a specialist for further evaluation and potential intervention. Don't stress, this is just my assessment. The most important thing is to consult a specialist. Take care!
